Package popt4jlib.neural.costfunction

Cost Functions for Neural Network Related Algorithms Parallel Implementation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    FFNNCostFunctionIntf
    all FFNN cost functions must implement this interface so that their gradient can be "auto"-computed.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CategoricalAccuracy
    measures the accuracy of classification where as error in a vector component counts any quantity that is (not NaN and) larger than 1/2 in absolute value.
    L1Norm
    implements the L1-norm function.
    L2Norm
    implements the L2-norm function.
    L2NormReg
    implements the regularized version of the L2-norm function, where besides the L2-norm of the errors, we add to the result the magnitude of the weights as a regularization component.
    MAE
    implements the Mean Absolute Error (MAE) function.
    MSSE
    implements the Mean Sum of Square Errors (MSSE) function.
    ThresErrorCounter
    implements an error counter where as error in a vector component counts any quantity that is (not NaN and) larger than a threshold in absolute value.
    ThresErrorCounterReg
    implements the regularized version of the ThresErrorCounter function, where besides the threshold-based counting of the errors, we add to the result the magnitude of the weights (multiplied by a λ factor) as regularization component.

Package popt4jlib.neural.costfunction Description

Cost Functions for Neural Network Related Algorithms Parallel Implementation.

Package Specification

This package contains a number of classes that implement cost functions applied to the errors produced by an ANN on labeled datasets (supervised classification or regression problems.) All classes are required to accept a double[] argument that may contain Double.NaN values and treat them as non-existent in the argument.
